rows.label: qev025106_MSG0002
rows.name: What'd I do to deserve this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0003
rows.name:
...Was it those Ma-non?
Oh, those little freaks, I knew it! I KNEW IT![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0004
rows.name: Y-you! You were with that Ma-non![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0005
rows.name:
I don't know what happened! I was eating,
then suddenly I just...passed out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0006
rows.name:
N-no! Wait! Don't leave me!
Please, you gotta hear me out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0007
rows.name:
I don't know what happened! I was eating,
then suddenly I just...passed out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0008
rows.name:
And when I woke up here, I had this BOMB attached
to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0009
rows.name:
Thanks for believing me! It IS the truth, I swear!
I knew you were different from that damn Ma-non![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0010
rows.name:
What? No, please! Why would I make something like
this up?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0011
rows.name: Anyway, you gotta help me disarm this thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0012
rows.name:
Mimeosome or not, I don't want to die.
You have to save me! Please![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_SEL0061
rows.name: State that diving into the lake might weaken the blast.

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0015
rows.name:
Aw, thanks, buddy! So, uh...you DO know something
about this kind of bomb, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0016
rows.name: Really? You do? Then my life's in your hands.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0017
rows.name:
...Heh, you really do know what you're doing.
So far so good! Now hurry up and get this thing
off me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0020
rows.name:
...Stopped. You disarmed it?
I'm...I'm gonna live?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0024
rows.name:
...No? Never seen one before?
Well, let's hope you're a natural, then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025106_MSG0028
rows.name: It's not stopping! It's not... Augh, you're useless![ST:wait ]
